name: burgundy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(also Burgundy) wine, usually red, that comes from the Burgundy region of eastern central France: She ordered a glass of burgundy. This is one of the best burgundies I have tasted. The wine reminded me of a fine white Burgundy.
a dark reddish-purple colour, like the colour of red wine: I like to wear burgundy and purple. There are deep reds and bright golds, mixed in with lavenders, burgundies and blues.
enjoynz/DigitalVision Vectors/GettyImages
